staxel.village.character.dialogue.RiahFr: It gets pretty lonely around here sometimes, mya.
I'm glad you're around to keep me company!
I've never told anyone this before mya...
He's so tall and intimidating, plus his voice is so booming, mya...
I haven't seen any bottled letters lately mya...
I guess I shouldn't expect them very often.
How do they even get here mya?
I wish there were a few more Caiths around here, mya.
Some of the other islanders like fish, but not in the same way!
And some of them look at me funny when I speak, mya...
You want to touch my ears, mya?
Caith ears are pretty amazing after all mya!
